Trade/Device Name(s): Contour® NEXT LINK Wireless Blood Glucose Meter
Contour NEXT LINK Wireless Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Specimen Type(s): Fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Contour® NEXT LINK Wireless Blood Glucose Meter
Medtronic MiniMed Paradigm REAL-Time Revel Insulin Pumps
Medtronic MiniMed Paradigm REAL-TIME Insulin Pumps
Medtronic MiniMed Carelink Therapy Management Software
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Contour NEXT LINK Wireless Blood Glucose Meter system for quantitative glucose measurement and wireless data transmission to Medtronic insulin pumps.
Indications for Use Summary: Over-the-counter system for single-patient self-monitoring of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip or palm, with wireless transmission to compatible Medtronic insulin pumps and therapy management software; not for diagnosis or neonatal use.
